title: Meghan Markle unseen photos published by Suits co-star ahead of series finale
text:
Ahead of the Suits series finale on Wednesday, actor Patrick J Adams has shared a series of candid behind-the-scenes photographs featuring his former co-star, the Duchess of Sussex.

Meghan Markle starred in the legal drama up until April 2018, one month prior to her wedding to Prince Harry.

In the photographs, which Adams shared on Instagram on Monday, Meghan, who played Rachel Zane, is pictured smiling with her co-stars on the show.

In one image, Meghan stands alone underneath a rain-covered umbrella while in another black and white photograph, she’s seen posing in front of the camera at a desk.

In an earlier post from Adams containing more photographs, Meghan is pictured lying on an office floor with actor Sarah Rafferty, who plays Donna Paulsen on the show.

Another snap shows the two women standing opposite one another and staring into the camera.

One photograph shows Meghan lying back on a sofa wearing a grey pencil skirt, white shirt and red stiletto heels.

Other snaps capture Meghan wearing casual clothes in front of a trailer and posing in a bathrobe and high heels.

The images have prompted thousands of comments from Adams' 2.5 million followers, with many focusing on the photos of Meghan and saying how much they'll miss the show.

"Truly miss Meghan," wrote one person, "but at the same time am super proud of everything she does and achieved".

Another fan added: "Those pictures of Meghan made my heart swell".
